title: WT for a mid grade N300 Mayo Cut Plug and N128 Goodwin
author: Stetson_1883

posts.post_title: WT for a mid grade N300 Mayo Cut Plug and N128 Goodwin
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to trade for a N300 Mayo Cut Plug common and/or a N162 Goodwin baseball common. I just want a sample from the sets for display purposes. Nothing with considerable border wear or creases....nothing valued over $500.

I can only offer a trade at this time...I have all sorts of HOF rookies, t206s and such.

Not in a rush as I wouldn't be able to send my card(s) until late August (out of town). Just testin the waters!

Pm me
